title: Dialectical Constructivism-Based Language Proficiency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and general understanding of learning topics
context.additional_context: Focuses on improving language proficiency linked to work tasks for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three or more dialectical analysis frameworks to language-related topics
Learners can generate and share at least one logical counterargument to peers' claims via a discussion platform
Learners derive actionable strategies for their professional contexts by comparing language usage cases from diverse perspectives
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
